subtitle: This sorbet can provide a refreshing break between a starter and main course. It could also be served as an aperitif.

method.text: Dissolve the gelatine in a little boiling water.
Process the tomatoes in a food processor or blender with the mint or basil leaves to form a puree. Strain through a sieve and discard the pips.
Blend the puree and tomato juice with the gelatine. Stir in cayenne pepper or Tabasco and celery salt to taste. Add the vodka.
Spoon the mixture into a shallow freezerproof container. Cover, seal and place in the freezer. Stir the mixture frequently as the mixture freezes.
To serve, spoon into serving dishes.

title: Bloody Mary sorbet
